description: 持続可能な宇宙環境（スペースサステナビリティ）に専業で取り組む世界初の民間企業。デブリ除去・寿命延長・故障機の観測点検など軌道上サービスを開発。2024年6月に東証グロース市場へ上場。商業デブリ除去実証衛星「ADRAS-J」は世界初のデブリ周回観測に成功。日本・英国・米国・イスラエルにグローバル拠点を持ち次世代への持続可能な軌道継承を目指す。
description_en: World's first private company dedicated to sustainable space environment (space sustainability). Develops on-orbit services including debris removal, life extension, and defunct satellite inspection. Listed on TSE Growth Market in June 2024. Commercial debris removal demonstration satellite "ADRAS-J" achieved world's first debris proximity observation. Global presence in Japan, UK, US, and Israel, aiming for sustainable orbital inheritance for future generations.
